title: Backdraft.Start
body: <> <> <> Who are you? What are you doing here? [[Relax, buddy, I'm not looking for trouble.|Alliance.1]] [[I could ask you the same question.|Lonewolf.1]]

title: Alliance.1
body: <> Relax, buddy, I'm not looking for trouble. <> You're not? Then maybe you'd better be on your way. This is a military facility, and you don't look like authorized personnel. [[I'm not, but I'm looking for someone. Maybe you can help me|True.1]] [[Look, can you just clear something up? Are you a superhero or did you get lost on the way to a fancy costume party?|Alliance.2]]

title: Lonewolf.1
body:
<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
I could ask you the same question.

<<set $speakingActor to "Backdraft">>
Minding my own business, unlike some. Why don't you go home, little girl?

[[Maybe we got off on the wrong foot.|Lonewolf.Alliance.2]]
[[...where do you get off, calling me 'little girl'?|Lonewolf.2]]

title: True.1
body:
<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
I'm not, but I'm looking for someone. 
Maybe you can help me.

<<set $speakingActor to "Backdraft">>
...I suppose I could. I've got a minute. 
Who're you looking for? 
Lost kitty, missing sister...?

<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
A flying kid in red and black armor. 
They go by Arachdroid.

<<set $speakingActor to "Backdraft">>
A kid in...flying armor?
AHAHAHAHA! Oh, honey, you're a real riot!

[[No, I'm not kidding.|True.2]]
[[Uh, heh heh, yeah. |True.Alliance.2]]

title: Alliance.2
body:
<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
Look, can you just clear something up? 
Are you a superhero or did you get lost on the way to a fancy costume party?

<<set $speakingActor to "Backdraft">>
I suppose I am. Yes. I'm a superhero. Of a sort.

<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
Great! What's your name?

<<set $speakingActor to "Backdraft">>
My...name?  I don't...uh...
...what business is it of yours, anyway?

<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
You still haven't explained what you're doing here.
Now...you can tell me you don't owe me an explanation.
But I have certain...inside information that told me that this shipyard is about to experience a devestating explosion today.
And here you are. 
Right at the epicenter of where the blast was supposed to have been triggered.
Wearing a mask, and a suit with...scorched cuffs.

<<set $speakingActor to "Backdraft">>
...
...
...I don't know where you got your information from, clever girl...
...but you're not leaving this place alive.

[[Fight]]

title: Lonewolf.2
body:
<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
...where do you get off, calling me 'little girl'?

<<set $speakingActor to "Backdraft">>
What's this? You think you're tough stuff, sweetie?

<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
Ms. Meta: I know I am. Let's see about YOU...little man.

[[Fight]]

title: True.2
body:
<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
No, I'm not kidding. It's a lot to explain. 
They're trying to find a legendary supervillain, 
a guy called Backdraft.
I'm concerned they'll try to tangle with him and get hurt. 
I have to head them off.

<<set $speakingActor to "Backdraft">>
...huh.
...Backdraft.
..that's a funny name.

<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
Well, superheroes only just started, uh, happening, around now.
Nobody was getting especially creative with their names at this point.
The Red Maiden wore a lot of red, Strongarm had strong arms.
And Backdraft had fire powers.
You still haven't told me your name, sir.
But I think I can guess it, 
from those scorched cuffs on your suit.
And the fact that it looks like you're in the right place, 
at the right time.

<<set $speakingActor to "Backdraft">>
You're smart. I'll give you that much.
And I don't know who you're getting your intel from...
...but you're not leaving here alive.

[[Fight]]

title: True.Alliance.2
body:
<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
Uh, heh heh, yeah. I got you good with the armor joke, huh?

[[Alliance.2]]

title: Lonewolf.Alliance.2
body:
<<set $speakingActor to "MsMeta">>
Maybe we got off on the wrong foot.

<<set $speakingActor to "Backdraft">>
Maybe we did.

[[Alliance.2]]

title: Fight
body:
<<set $leftActor to null>>
<<set $rightActor to null>>
<<set $speakingActor to null>>
